item.title: Pokémon Roleplay - Character Sheets
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Character Sheet

Name - Kiran Halbeck
Gender - Male
Physical Description - Kiran is an olive skinned boy that has loose curly brown hair that covers up his smokey blue eyes with a strong, cheerful face. He wears suspenders or khakis with a button up or polo shirt in almost any weather(although it’s usually sunny for him bc of Whimsicott) with his father’s old army/pokemon ranger pin.
Personality - Kiran wants to be a pokemon ranger just like his father and help others, but he thinks he deserves praise after helping someone due to being a bit insecure and wanting people to acknowledge that he deserves to be one as his mother wants him to follow in her own footsteps and become an influential politician. He doesn’t like to get his hands dirty, partly due to being raised an elitist, however much he tries to deny it. He rarely gets along with his mother, especially when it comes to his future and her expectations, but he does listen to her and love her, even if he doesn’t act like it sometimes.
Pokémon - Whimsicott
Pokémon Gender - Female
Pokémon Type - Grass/Fairy
Favorite Ability - Sunny Day
Natural Ability - Prankster

@Magnus idk how good this is, kinda threw it together last minute so if u got questions or wanna know backstory just dm me

edit: @magnus changed up my personality bc we got too many “nice” kids and i wanna change up my backstory a little bit

Read full topic

item.title: Pokémon Roleplay - Character Sheets
item.dc:creator: GamerPoke
item.description:
Character Sheet

Name - Manthis Fillia
Gender - Female
Physical Description - A blonde gal with blue eyes, and some green strands on her hair. She always wears a flannel, and black/grey jeans.
Personality - A kind person who loves helping people, but sometimes is selfish too. Even though she likes helping people, she isn’t a fan of humans much. Loves math.
Pokémon - Pancham
Pokémon Gender - Male
Pokémon Type - Fighting
Favorite Ability - Karate Chop
Natural Ability - Mold Breaker

item.title: Pokémon Roleplay - Character Sheets
item.dc:creator: Minho
item.description:
Character Sheet

Name - Sammy Lake
Gender - Male
Physical Description - A short boy with cropped hair and a Pokéball with a decorative pattern — a shooting star over the basic red and white design — in his back pocket, given to him by his family the day he applied. He doesn’t care particularly what he wears. He has blue eyes.
Personality - Doesn’t take life too hard, just cruising. He’s a funny guy, telling jokes. He’s rather weak, and is sensitive to being called short.
Pokémon - Eevee
Pokémon Gender - Female
Pokémon Type - Normal
Favorite Ability - Attraction
Natural Ability - Anticipation

Read full topic

item.title: Pokémon Roleplay - Character Sheets
item.dc:creator: DirectorHail
item.description:
Character Sheet

Name - Connor Hanforth
Gender - Male
Physical Description - Tall, Tanned skin. Green eyes with brown hair.
Personality - Very social and likes to avoid violence. Empathetic but won’t hesitate to harm if forced to. Very likeable and protective of his friends, although he hates antagonistic relationships and prefers to stay on a good level with everyone, unless those people are evil assholes then that’s an acception.
Pokémon - Psyduck
Pokémon Gender - Male
Pokémon Type - Water
Favorite Ability - Water Pulse
Natural Ability - Cloud-Nine

Read full topic

item.title: Pokémon Roleplay - Character Sheets
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
Example cards:
Names relating to real life people living or dead is entirely coincidental.

Character Sheet

Name - Magnus Apollon
Gender - Male
Physical Description - A boy with fair skin and messy brown hair and brown eyes. He wears glasses and can be seen squinting at far away objects without them. He has a symbol on a chain around his neck with the Pokémon electricity symbol. He wears a black jacket with jeans and combat boots.
Personality - Generally unfriendly, difficult to get along with most people who don’t know him. He’s stubborn and seems to argue wth everyone. Despite this, he doesn’t prey on the weak and he is true to his friends.
Pokémon - Pikachu
Pokémon Gender - Male
Pokémon Type - Electric
Favorite Ability - Volt Tackle
Natural Ability - Static

Character Sheet

Name - James Cascade
Gender - Male
Physical Description - A boy with thin golden hair except for two thick strands that go into his green eyes. He has a scar on the back of his right hand in the form of a thin cut. He has a symbol on a chain around his neck with the Pokémon water symbol. He wears a gray jacket that is usually unzipped, parting to show a white shirt. He wears blue jeans.
Personality - A likeable boy who wields words with skill. He can make people feel good about themselves and never tries to push someone until they break. He likes everyone, people and Pokémon.
Pokémon - Squirtle
Pokémon Gender - Male
Pokémon Type - Water
Favorite Ability - Double Team
Natural Ability - WaterFall

Read full topic
